bibl.title: Army and Society in Ptolemaic Egypt - A Question of Loyalty.
bibl.note: Enlarged and annotated version of a lecture given on the occasion of the 8th International Congress of Egyptologists at Cairo. - Deals with the situation of Upper Egypt in the late Ptolemaic period.
bibl.seg: BLASIUS Andreas, Army and Society in Ptolemaic Egypt - A Question of Loyalty.
Enlarged and annotated version of a lecture given on the occasion of the 8th International Congress of Egyptologists at Cairo. - Deals with the situation of Upper Egypt in the late Ptolemaic period.
